title: Maternal & Child Health Management System
description: A digital platform for healthcare delivery and monitoring across maternal and childcare levels. Includes role-based portals for mothers, healthcare workers, and administrators.

title: HRD Skills Learning & Development Portal
description: A system for managing training records, attendance, and generating reports for officials in the Gauteng Department of Health. Facilitates annual training needs analysis and participation trends.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience. Built with responsive design and smooth animations using GSAP.
